mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberHost(mhId, mhName, mhNum, mhPhone, mhAddr1, mhAddr2, mhZip, mhAc_name, bankNum, mhAc_num, mhEnabled, mhSign) VALUES (#{mhId}, #{mhName}, #{mhNum}, #{mhPhone}, #{mhAddr1}, #{mhAddr2}, #{mhZip}, #{mhAc_name}, #{bankNum}, #{mhAc_num}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT mhId, mhName, mhNum, mhPhone, mhAddr1, mhAddr2, mhZip, mhAc_name, bankNum, mhAc_num, mhEnabled, mhSign FROM memberHost WHERE mhId = #{userId}
